data.description: Highlights the important interaction between nutrition and the human gastrointestinal tract (GI). Includes exploration of various gastrointestinal related disorders and diseases, and covers contemporary issues, current research, and real-life examples applicable to the field of nutrition, and nutrition providers. Includes instruction from content collaborators and GI nutrition experts. Apply the pathophysiology of GI disorders and disease, deconstruct differential diagnoses; and describe current medical management and dietary requirements of an individual and translate this into appropriate medical nutritional therapy.
data.title: NUTRITIONAL MANAGEMENT OF GASTROINTESTINAL DISORDERS
